title: Braised beef cheeks with beer and mash
description: Cook this flavourful cut of meat low and slow and you'll be rewarded with the most tender meat imaginable.
ingredients: 5 carrots, 4 left whole, 1 cut into chunks
1 bulb of garlic, cut in half
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
1kg/2lb 4oz floury potatoes, peeled and cut into chunks
salt and freshly ground black pepper
